sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez informer tous les employés.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please notify all employees.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Nous avons finalement surmonté les difficultés.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: We finally overcame the difficulties.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Sa carrière est très réussie.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: His career is very successful.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 警察正在调查这件案子。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Jǐngchá zhèngzài diàochá zhè jiàn ànzi.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: La police enquête sur cette affaire.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The police are investigating this case.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 请用尺量一下这张桌子。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qǐng yòng chǐ liáng yīxià zhè zhāng zhuōzi.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Mesure cette table avec une règle.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please measure this table with a ruler.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: La ville se développe rapidement.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The city is developing rapidly.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je suis contre cette proposition.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I oppose this proposal.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: L'enfant s'est déjà endormi.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The child has already fallen asleep.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: J'ai besoin d'aller me faire couper les cheveux.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I need to get a haircut.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ils se sont serré la main.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: They shook hands with each other.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 我们之间有很深的信任。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒmen zhījiān yǒu hěn shēn de xìnrèn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il y a une grande confiance entre nous.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: There is deep trust between us.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qǐng gěi wǒ yī gēn xīguǎn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Donnez-moi une paille, s'il vous plaît.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please give me a straw.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qǐng jǐnkuài huífù wǒ de yóujiàn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez répondre à mon e-mail dès que possible.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please reply to my email as soon as possible.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Jīnwǎn yǒu yī chǎng yīnyuè yǎnchū.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il y a un concert ce soir.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: There is a music performance tonight.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè zhèngmíng le tā shì duì de.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Cela prouve qu'il avait raison.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This proves that he was right.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il m'a suggéré de partir.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He hinted that I should leave.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ne gaspille pas la nourriture.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Don't waste food.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Merci pour ton aide.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Thank you for your help.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Nous allons faire de l'escalade ce week-end.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: We are going mountain climbing this weekend.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Elle est traductrice.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: She is a translator.
